## np array


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
# Your Python code
#py_install("numpy"")
import numpy as np

arr = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
print(arr * 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```{.custom-output}
[ 2  4  6  8 10]
```
